title: Expense Tracker
description: This web application allows users to track their expenses and manage them effectively. The front-end is built using React.js, while the back-end is set up using Node.js and Express with a MySQL database. So far, users can view, add, update, and delete expenses, including details such as name, description, type, and amount. Additionally, I am planning to add a graph function that will show users how their expenses fluctuate throughout the months.

title: Cryptocurrency Tracker
description: This website displays the stock prices of some of the cryptocurrency coins. The users can search for specific coins. I am currently working on displaying graphs of the coins' prices changing over time. I coded this projects using React.js, HTML, and CSS. Retrieved and processed cryptocurrency coin data from external API to enhance application functionality.

title: E-commerce Website
description: Developed using React.js, CSS, and HTML, this application allows users to create unique accounts and offers a shopping list. Users can select and add items to their shopping cart and proceed to purchase the products.
